original_text: It stood upon twelve oxen, three looking toward the north, and three looking toward the west, and three looking toward the south, and three looking toward the east: and the sea was set above upon them, and all their hinder parts were inward.
korean_text: 그 바다를 소 열두 마리가 받쳤으니 셋은 북쪽을 향하였고 셋은 서쪽을 향하였고 셋은 남쪽을 향하였고 셋은 동쪽을 향하였으며 바다를 그 위에 놓았고 소의 뒤는 다 안으로 두었으며

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 열두 소 위에 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: and three looking toward the west
and three looking toward the south
and three looking toward the east
and the sea was set above upon them
and all their hinder parts were inward
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 모든 뒷부분은 안쪽을 향하였다
